data.name: NeoPiano Demo
data.detailed_description:
NeoPiano is a midi vizualizer software which bring live performances to life. In this Demo version, it is only possible to play a limited number of notes before the screen blurs and demo ends.

Brief features inventory
  • Playing with a midi keyboard in real time
  • Casting customizable neons
  • Special effects as Tails on substain, particles.
  • Loading and playing MIDI files
data.about_the_game:
NeoPiano is a midi vizualizer software which bring live performances to life. In this Demo version, it is only possible to play a limited number of notes before the screen blurs and demo ends.

Brief features inventory
  • Playing with a midi keyboard in real time
  • Casting customizable neons
  • Special effects as Tails on substain, particles.
  • Loading and playing MIDI files
data.short_description: NeoPiano is a midi vizualizer software which bring live performances to life. NeoPiano Demo includes all the features of the full version. However, it is only possible to play a limited number of notes before the screen blurs and demo ends.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
